Founders + Funders

“In establishing this scholarship for Black, Indigenous and design students of colour, we hope to show our support for individuals in their design studies, encourage dialogue in the profession, and shine a bright light on the pressing need for diversity, equity and inclusion both in the academy and in the studio.”

— Andrew Boardman CGD, of Manoverboard

2021 Donors

Brandish, Guppy Design, Honest Agency, Manoverboard, Relish New Brand Experience, 'Segun Olude, Sly Bird Creative

Thank you to all our generous donors and contributors!
